text: Brock Purdy (born December 27, 1999) is a professional football quarterback for the San Francisco 49ers in the United States' National Football League (NFL). == Personal life == Purdy grew up in Queen Creek, Arizona. He attended Perry High School in Gilbert, Arizona. After he graduated, he went to Iowa State University in Ames, Iowa. There, he played football and majored in communication studies, graduating with a 3.66 grade point average (GPA). On March 9, 2024, Purdy married Jenna Brandt. == NFL career == Purdy was drafted into the NFL in 2022 by the San Francisco 49ers. == References == Category:American football quarterbacks Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:1999 births Category:Living people
title: Brock Purdy
